text: JLTV may refer to: * Jewish Life Television (JLTV) * Jilin Television (JLTV; ) * Joint Light Tactical Vehicle, U.S. military general purpose light vehicle, replacing the Humvee jeep ** Lockheed Martin JLTV ** General Tactical Vehicles JLTV Eagle ** BAE Systems JLTV ==See also== * *HMMWV (High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicle) Humvee Hummer H0 *Light Utility Vehicle (Jeep) *Jeep (disambiguation)
title: JLTV (disambiguation)
